text_block_list.text: One day, I was looking for Air Shakur. I was surprised to find her fast asleep, with her laptop still on.
As I went to close her laptop, something onscreen caught my eye. She was on the front page of a social media site, logged in as "!monad"——
It looked like an account dedicated to posting digital music. A bit taken aback by her unexpected hobby, I quietly took my leave.
A few days later, the two of us went to check out a record store.
I'd invited her, thinking I had nothing to lose, and it turned out that she was planning to buy something anyway. She let me come along— "As long as you don't do anything else".

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Y'know, you sure shrug things off easy. It's like you forgot what happened with the net cafe…

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Don't you try and start a conversation while we're in there.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …Whole lotta problems when it comes to small-time artists, huh. If they were with a label I could just click buy and be done with it.
It seemed she was planning to buy a CD from a fairly unknown artist.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …Not really. 's just good for clearing my head.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …Oh.

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: ——Take a listen, everyone. Here's my new song—— "rust".
Shakur stopped suddenly to watch the young musician spinning music on her turntable.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …She's the one whose CD I came to buy.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Never thought I'd see her now of all times.
With that, Shakur slunk a bit further away from the DJ, taking in the music.
With the melody set to an energetic rhythm, punctuated with light vocal samples, it was the kind of pleasant music you couldn't help but move along with.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …Not bad, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: From the sample she posted, I thought it'd be more high-pitched old-school stuff… Looks like she shifted gears to more of a bounce vibe.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Well, styles change. C'mon, let's go.

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: E-excuse me! Please, take a look!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Hmm?
The artist handed a flyer to Shakur.

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: I'm still new and all, but I'm going to be DJing at this event. Please come and enjoy, if you're interested!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …Thanks. Oh, it's this weekend —— …!
I took a look at the flyer. The DJ's introductory blurb described her as "Inspired by the faceless DJ !monad " —

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: Uh… Sorry, is there something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Nah, you're good. Good luck this weekend.
choice_data_list: So there's a DJ you admire, eh?
So there's a DJ you admire, eh?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ! Hey!

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: Yeah, totally! I really look up to !monad ! It's pretty easy to tell our styles are similar, so I try to keep super conscious about it.

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: Those voice samples were my way of differentiating myself, y'know? I'm still working on it, though!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …!monad is just an hobbyist keeping their hands busy. They don't even have the fundamentals down.

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: Whoa, whoa, don't say stuff like that. !monad is like, my hero!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …Your hero?

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: Well, not like they swooped in and saved me. Never even seen their face. It's more like…

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: I didn't really fit in. And my life wasn't great. I was stuck in a rut, and didn't think things could really change.

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: But hearing !monad give the world the finger with their music really inspired me! Got me thinking maybe I could do it, too!

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: Wait, no! Forget all that stuff about me, they're on a whole other level! The call of their soul, the evanescence, there's nothing like it!

text_block_list.name: Young Music Artist
text_block_list.text: I hope I can meet the real thing someday. I bet they're, like, passionate to the bone!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ……… …Oh, really.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …Ah? What's with that shit-eating grin…!
A few days later…

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Hey, check this out. This flyer stuck out a lot on bulletin board. Wonder if some student put it up.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, maybe. What's it for, anyway? Some kind of dance club? …Ooh, might go check it out.
It seemed like the peculiar-looking flyer caused quite a bit of buzz among the students.
